doc.name: CanBusAttributes
doc.description: The attributes configured per port which is mediated by a CanBus. The mediation where (which switch port) messages are going into the switch and where (which switch port) messages are going out of the switch.
doc.author: Gilles Lasnier, Based on BasiSwitch.java by Patricia Derler
doc.property: Value of the CAN priority parameter.
